column5: Just an FYI, I saw the commercial for a show called Patent Bending for tonight at 9:30 and it showed them trying to come up with new techniques to get your lure and line out as far as you can when fishing.  It looked interesting and I thought maybe some of you might want to watch it.  Its on the Discovery Channel at 9:30.  Joey
ill be watching after guinea pig looks interesting
hmmm.... sounds interesting but 24 is on tonight and i have no say as to what the wief watches, i mean WE watch tonight lol
I caught it a week or two ago and it was interesting.
hmmm ... welll .. depending on how my leafs are doing ...hopefully I'll be glued to the game
I'll be at badminton tonight until 10pm, I hope someone can provide a summary.
Patent Bending it is! Thanks for the tip, Joey.
I 'tink they skate tomorrow....   Thanks Joey!
sounds interesting, ill be tuned in.
yes i have seen the show its a repeat and yes its very interesting  ..its worth watching cheers
bringing this to the top cause its 9:30...

Yeah I just watched most of it.....  I don't know why someone wasted their money trying to patent that stuff.  When they went to the lake is it just me or did it totally look like Lake O?  I could have sworn it looked like Lake O in Mississauga.
kind of looked like port credit but lake O isnt salt water and that trout wasnt 4 lbs

It was pretty neat.  But really, the only one that was the easiest, more affordable one was the gun.  The boat and helicopter probably cost a pretty penny, so I don't think it would be feasible (says the woman with at least $10,000 worth of fishing tackle   ).  Joey

That was 30 minutes out of my already dwindling life expectancy. The only redeeming moment was when the chopper owner said: If the line gets tangled in the rear rotor, my chopper could get pulled into the lake." To which Einstein smilingly replied: " Right on!".
That idea with the boat can be done, cheap 2 channel radio, might have to try that at Craigleith.
